libraryID.description: Library ID as provided by the lab

metadataType.description: For files of dataSubtype: metadata, a description of the type of metadata in the file.

anyOf.description: Metadata describing properties of an assay conducted in the study
Metadata describing properties of specimens collected and/or analyzed in the study
Metadata describing terms or variables that appear in another file
Metadata describing properties of individuals (human or animal) represented in the study

A plan specification which has sufficient level of detail and quantitative information to communicate it between investigation agents, so that different investigation agents will reliabley be able to independently reproduce the process

organRIN.description: Organ RIN, as previously measured on organ or region

passage.description: Number of times a cell culture has been subcultured

pcrCycles.description: Number of PCR cycles to amplify transposed DNA fragments
